ResearchProjectDef.label: Double action
ResearchProjectDef.description: An improved version of the single action mechanism, allowing the hammer to be cocked and released with a single trigger pull.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Break action
ResearchProjectDef.description: A type of action when the gun "breaks" in half and cartridges or shells are loaded directly into the cylinder or barrel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pump action
ResearchProjectDef.description: A type of action where a forend is "pumped" back and forth to eject a spent casing and load in a new one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lever action
ResearchProjectDef.description: A type of action where the trigger guard is manipulated back and forth like a lever.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bolt action
ResearchProjectDef.description: A type of action where the bolt is directly manipulated in order to cycle rounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: High caliber
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to handle the pressures of high caliber rounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Self-loading and recoil operation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of firearms that use the recoil of the barrel to cycle the next round from a magazine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Self-loading shotguns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of shotguns that use the recoil of the barrel to cycle shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Submachine Guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of full-auto, compact firearms that use pistol calibers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Selective fire
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of firearms employing intermediate cartridges and with full auto and/or burst capabilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flamethrowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of flamethrowers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light machine guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of light machine guns that can fire for prolonged periods of time without overheating.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ammunition belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of firearms that are fed by rounds connected together with cheap metal links in "belts".

ResearchProjectDef.label: Polymer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the creation of polymers for use in firearms (kinda just a techblock for now, eventually(tm) will be patched to have actual polymer)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bakelite framing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Replace parts of guns with polymer/bakelite, which are lower weight compared to wood/steel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced gun furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of firearms that have attachments like foregrips.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lenses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create basic lenses for building primitive gunsights.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple scopes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create basic scopes for long-range shooting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modern scopes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create modern scopes for long-range, increasingly accurate shooting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Caseless ammunition
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft weapons using caseless ammuniton, which is lighter and cheaper than standard cased rounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Optical targeting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make optical targeting systems for use in automated weaponry.
